description: This scholarship was established in 2009 by Dr. Ted Honea in honor of the late Tamara Long, who passed away in 2002 after a 30-year theatre career. Long came to the University of Central Oklahoma in 1988 to help develop the musical theatre degree. The scholarship is awarded to musical theatre students by nomination of the faculty. Eligibility Musical theatre major Requirements AWARDED BY COMMITTEE NOMINATION. Nominated student(s) will be invited to apply by the college's scholarship coordinator

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
